name: payum/core
description: Domain  friendly payment framework. Paypal, payex, authorize.net, be2bill, omnipay, recurring payments, instant notifications and many more

suggest.payum/paypal-express-checkout-nvp: If you want to use paypal express checkout, digital goods or recurring payments
suggest.payum/paypal-pro-checkout-nvp: If you want to use paypal pro checkout
suggest.payum/paypal-rest: If you want to use paypal rest gateway
suggest.payum/paypal-ipn: If you want to use paypal instant payment notifications(Paypal IPN)
suggest.payum/authorize-net-aim: If you want to use Authorize.Net AIM payment gateway
suggest.payum/be2bill: If you want to use be2bill payment gateway
suggest.payum/payex: If you want to use payex payment gateway
suggest.payum/omnipay-bridge: If you want to use omnipay's gateways
suggest.doctrine/orm: If you want to store models to database using doctrin2 ORM
suggest.doctrine/mongodb-odm: If you want to store models to mongo doctrin2 ODM
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: If you want to store models to Zend Db ORM
suggest.symfony/routing: If you want to use TokenFactory from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/http-kernel: If you want to use HttpRequestVerifier from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: If you want to use HttpRequestVerifier or HttpResponse reply from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/form: If you want to use forms
suggest.monolog/monolog: In case you want to use logger
